org.openmobster.core.mobileCloud.android.kernel
Class DeviceContainer

java.lang.Object
  org.openmobster.core.mobileCloud.android.kernel.DeviceContainer

public final class DeviceContainer
extends Object

Device Container. There should be only a single container instance running on the entire device and is included with the Device Agent installed on the device

Author:
openmobster@gmail.com
